Chinese (Simplified): 蒸汽驱动机械自动加煤机

English: No work trains available for purchase

Description: Warning about gadgets being lost upon clearing CCL work trains
English: Congratulations on your first CCL work train purchase!\n\nDue to limitations, gadgets are lost when clearing these work trains, so please avoid doing so. Thank you for your understanding.
Portuguese: Parabéns pelo seu primeiro comboio de serviço CCL!\n\nDevido a limitações, gadgets são perdidos quando estes comboios são removidos do mundo, portanto é recomendado não o fazer. Agradecemos a compreensão.
Chinese (Simplified): 恭喜购买首台CCL作业车！\n\n由于机制限制，装在此类车上的小仪器会在你清除此类车后直接丢失，所以尽量不要清除它们，感谢理解！

Description: Tutorial condition for the trainset to be present
English: The entire trainset must be present.
This control uses steam to power a small engine that moves fuel into the firebox automatically.
This control operates a deflector to reduce damage done by high-velocity exhaust to ceilings.
This control selects a mode of operation of another control from multiple options.
This control swaps the mode of operation of the power control between throttle and dynamic breaking.
